description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Panthéon des martyrs de la liberté, ou histoire des révolutions politiques, et des personnages qui se sont dévoués pour le bien et la liberté des nations, etc. [With illustrations.]]" Author: BESSIÈRES, Lucien. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9008.i.3." Volume: 03 Page: 376 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1880 Edition: [Another edition.] Les Martyres de la liberté, etc. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000303838 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
